Sun Nov 3 2024\\\\n  - [x] [borsh-rs(chore): cover one more `syn::generics::TypeParamBound` as per syntax change](https://github.com/near/borsh-rs/pull/316)\\\\n  - [x] [borsh-rs(chore): `serde_json::Value` bridging example/doc](https://github.com/near/borsh-rs/pull/317)\\\\n  - [x] [cargo-near(chore): add `passed_env` to default docker template](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/242)\\\\n  - [x] [cargo-near(ci): pass releaze-plz token again (both checkout and createpullrequest)](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/243)\\\\n  - [x] [near-sdk-rs(ci): replace `hub` with `gh` in `compare-sizes.yml`](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1251)\\\\n  - [x] [near-sdk-rs(chore): compile `test_examples{,_small}.yml` with `near_workspaces::compile_project`](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1253)\\\\n- [ ] week Mon Nov 4 2024 - Sun Nov 10 2024\\\\n  - [x] [near-workspaces(chore): make `cargo-near-build` optional in manifest](https://github.com/near/near-workspaces-rs/pull/383)\\\\n  - [ ] [near-sdk-rs: Quickstart example panics on rust v1.80+ (aarch64-apple-darwin, bug of Xcode < 15.4)](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/issues/1252)\\\\n  - [x] [near-sdk-rs(chore): compile `test_examples{,_small}.yml` with `near_workspaces::compile_project`](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1253)\\\\n  - [x] [cargo-near(chore): gracefully handle missing `git` on `cargo near new`](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/246)\\\\n  - [x] [borsh-rs(chore): remove dependency on `syn_derive`](https://github.com/near/borsh-rs/pull/318)\\\\n- [ ] week Mon Nov 11 2024 - Sun Nov 17 2024\\\\n  - [x] [cargo-near(feat): added the ability to use the `--teach-me` flag](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/221)\\\\n  - [x] [near-sdk-rs(chore): compile `test_examples{,_small}.yml` with `near_workspaces::compile_project`](https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs/pull/1253)\\\\n  - [x] [borsh-rs(fix): specify a minimum version for `syn` as `2.0.81`](https://github.com/near/borsh-rs/pull/320)\\\\n  - [x] [near-workspaces(chore): reexport `cargo-near-build` for configurable build](https://github.com/near/near-workspaces-rs/pull/386)\\\\n  - [ ] [cargo-near(feat): reproducible choice interactive](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/256)\\\\n- [ ] week Mon Nov 18 2024 - Sun Nov 24 2024\\\\n  - [x] [near-workspaces-rs(ci): add `jlumbroso/free-disk-space` to `./github/workflows/test.yml`](https://github.com/near/near-workspaces-rs/pull/389)\\\\n  - [ ] [abstract-dao(bump): rust to 1.82, pkgs versions + `cargo-near` version in ci](https://github.com/nearuaguild/abstract-dao/pull/9)\\\\n  - [x] [cargo-near-image(feat): add clang](https://github.com/SourceScan/cargo-near-image/pull/4)\\\\n  - [ ] [cargo-near(feat): reproducible choice interactive](https://github.com/near/cargo-near/pull/256)\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n### Cost\\\\n- Total hours: 83 \\\\n- Rate: $50/hour\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "nomadx.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "4150", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 133509710}

{"id": 256, "body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Thomas for 10/28/2024 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}11/09/2024", "summary": "I worked on replacing the indexer infrastructure which we use at devhub to efficiently query data about proposals and rfp\\\\\\'s so we can filter order search in the main dashboards of the events committee infrastructure committee and devhub itself.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "## Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**Week 1: October 28 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}November 1**\\\\n\\\\nMonday 28 - 1 hour\\\\n- Reviewed PR [96](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/96)\\\\n- Worked on containerising the database and connecting the sqlx database\\\\n\\\\nTuesday 29 -  6 hours\\\\n- Called with Peter to containerise the postgres database. We also created a devcontainer for the query-api collaborators can work from github codespaces.\\\\n- Worked on `devhub-cache-api-rs` types conversions between contract and our sql database that was developed for the QueryApi.\\\\n\\\\n Wednesday 30 - 6 hours\\\\n- Attend standup \\\\n- Worked on the infrastructure committee portal where 1 bug was found in the linked proposal / RFPs. Also worked on a feature request to drop the rejected proposals to the bottom of the list.\\\\n- Created issue [978](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/978)\\\\n- Created issue [979](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/979)\\\\n- Created PR  [976](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/976) \\\\n\\\\nThursday 31 - 2 hours\\\\n- Researched bug with `fetchApprovedRfpProposals` where the infrastructure committee referenced the wrong indexer query name [977](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/977)\\\\n- Created PR [977](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/977)\\\\n\\\\nFriday 1st - 6 hours\\\\n- I worked on converting the Rust types from Nearblocks and  the RPC to what we stored on the indexer that is already live. [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948) 772d6f\\\\n- I worked on the setting up the Devcontainer database\\\\n\\\\n**Total hours: 21**\\\\n\\\\n**Week 2: November 4 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}November 8**\\\\n\\\\nMonday 4 - 2 hours\\\\n- Fixed a bug with the timestamp where the timestamp from nearblocks was in nano seconds while the near API used milliseconds\\\\n\\\\nTuesday 5 - 8 hours\\\\n- Get the newest RFP snapshots via the RPC Caching API\\\\n- Fix the endpoint to get proposals with latest snapshots [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948)\\\\n\\\\nWednesday 6 - 8 hours\\\\n- Fix the CORS issue caching API and start working on replacing the front end [968](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/968) & [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948)\\\\n- Attend standup from Bangkok\\\\n\\\\nThursday 7 - 8 hours\\\\n- The repository had some importing issues with clashing main.rs and lib.rs which I worked on from the nearprotocol labs co working space \\\\n- Setup multiple environments for infra events and devhub, also deploy them to fly. \\\\n- Update Rocket to use latest environment configuration \\\\n- Updated API key to deploy from CI/CD [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948)\\\\n\\\\nFriday 8 - 8 hours\\\\n- Worked on a bug with deserialising the nearblocks api where transactions could have null actions.\\\\n- Added search endpoints for the proposals dashboard search input and refactored some of the nearblocks client code [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948)\\\\n\\\\n**Total hours: 34**\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n## Cost\\\\n\\\\n- Total hours: 55\\\\n- Rate: $100/hour ~ \\\\u{20ac}90/hour is an average rate for a mid-level freelance front-end web3 developer in the Netherlands, ranging from \\\\u{20ac}35 (absolute beginner) to \\\\u{20ac}150 (senior) [for example](https://zzpservicedesk.nl/uurtarief-freelance-developer/)\\\\n- Total amount: $5500 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "thomasguntenaar.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "550", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": []}

Also supporting the treasury dashboards.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "## Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**Week 1: November 11 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}November 15**\\\\n\\\\nNovember 11 - 4 hours\\\\n- Fix the CI and set sqlx to offline [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948)\\\\n- Added endpoint to manage the timestamp inside the deployed environments\\\\n\\\\nNovember 12 - 3 hours\\\\n- Added templar environment, did the first deployment for it, updated the ci. [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948)\\\\n- Added endpoints to get the snapshots of single rfp and proposal to support the timeline feature. [948](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/948)\\\\n- Added RPC functions to get the Rfp and proposal on a specific block.\\\\n- Migrated the database\\\\n\\\\nNovember 19 - 4 hours\\\\n- Worked on the front end to integrate the new indexer with our components, replacing all instances where we use QueryAPI [968](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/968)\\\\n- Investigate failing tests on PR [982](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/982)\\\\n\\\\nNovember 20 - 8 hours\\\\n- Attend standup\\\\n- Fixing tests on PR [982](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/982)\\\\n- Feedback call with Ori\\\\n- Reorganising [968](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/968)\\\\n- Added more endpoints to manage the deployed databases \\\\n- Worked on front end components like SimpleMDE, Accepted terms and LinkedProposals dropdown to replace the queryAPI\\\\n- Refactor some components from the events committee to use Devhub\\\\\\'s components instead\\\\n- Mock the API in the front end tests\\\\n\\\\nNovember 21 - 8 hours\\\\n- Called with Peter to scope the rest of this EPIC creating issue [986](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/986)\\\\n- Fixed all front end tests [982](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/982)\\\\n- Refactor the API to simplify the rocket endpoint, added update_nearblocks_data to transactions.rs [982](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/982)\\\\n- Allow for null origins in the API to fix the CORS issue with the Markdown editor [982](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/982)\\\\n\\\\nNovember 22 - 8 hours\\\\n- Defined the ETA for the EPIC and scoping what is left on the agenda\\\\n- Debugging and fixing last 3 tests with Peter [982](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/982)\\\\n- Debugging issue Megha mentioned about a missing snapshots [990](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/990)\\\\n\\\\nNovember 24 -
